title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Phone Call with Taoiseach Leo Varadkar of Ireland – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 27, 2017
President Donald J. Trump spoke today with Taoiseach Leo Varadkar to congratulate him on his new role as the prime minister of Ireland. President Trump underscored the importance of the United States-Ireland relationship and invited Taoiseach Varadkar to participate in the traditional White House St. Patrick’s Day celebration in March 2018.
